name: TapspirationInstantMotivation
0:
”Alexa, open positive ideas”
”Alexa, ask Positive Ideas to share a Bible verse”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: positive ideas
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Positive Ideas by Tapspiration is your daily companion for motivation and inspiration. Just ask, and Alexa will tell you a new and different motivational quote that will help you face your day with a positive attitude.

How to use?
Just say "Alexa, open positive ideas" to receive a new quote.
Or say “Alexa, ask positive ideas for a Bible verse” to receive a unique Bible quote.

Whether you need a boost of confidence, a reminder of your inner strength or just a positive thought, Positive Ideas by Tapspiration is always there for you. Transform your daily routine into an inspiring and motivational experience.

*Apply daily phrase limits available on our website www.tapspiration.com
